content.caption: 🚀 Ready to level up your professional game? Check out our latest video for 5 game-changing tips that every young professional needs to know! 🎥💼 Whether you're entering the workforce or climbing the corporate ladder, we've got you covered. Don’t forget to share your favorite tip in the comments! 👇✨ #CareerGrowth #ProfessionalTips

avatar_data.prompt: A realistic portrait photo of a 25-35 year old person, friendly, professional, engaging personality, professional headshot quality, studio lighting, high resolution, photorealistic, detailed facial features, natural expression, suitable for social media profile, modern style

content.media_prompt: A tips social media post image, featuring the same person from the avatar, related to: 🚀 Ready to level up your professional game? Check out our latest video for 5 game-changing tips that, high quality, professional, Instagram-worthy, bright and engaging, modern aesthetic
